tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE behavior_data (
   user_id INT,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP,
   action VARCHAR(255),
   duration INT
   FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_preferences(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserPreferences (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    theme_color VARCHAR(255),
    font_size INT,
    language VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE BehaviorData (
    behavior_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    behavior_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE PersonalizedExperiences (
    experience_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    experience_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE BehavioralBiometrics (
    biometric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    biometric_data BYTEA,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE user_profile_table (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    password_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);
